icarus.commandfactory

Class CommandFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • icarus.commandfactory.CommandFactory

  • public class CommandFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles commands specified by the UI, including calls to operatorSoftware, saving and loading and calculating player's score
    Author:
    Team Haddock

      • functional

        public boolean functional(Component component,
                 int pumpID)
                   throws InvalidComponentException
        Variation of functional(Component) for pumps, returns the functionality of a specified pump
        Parameters:
        component - Required to be set to Component.WATERPUMP, specifies the component to inspect
        pumpNum - The id of the pump to inspect
        Returns:
        whether the specified pump is functional
        Throws:
        InvalidComponentException - Thrown when a bad component is specified

      • isRepairing

        public boolean isRepairing(Component component,
                  int pumpID)
        The pump variant of isRepairing(Component). Returns whether a specified pump is currently being repaired.
        Parameters:
        component - required to be set to Component.WATERPUMP, specifies the component to inspect
        id - The pump ID to inspect
        Returns:
        Whether the specified pump is being repaired

      • achievementResponse

        public java.lang.String achievementResponse(java.lang.String playerName)
        the achievementResponse() method calculates what medal the player achieves when they hit a game over scenario
        Parameters:
        playerName - the name of the player
        Returns:
        response INdicates the response a player receives based on how highly they scored in the game

      • next

      • turnOff

        public void turnOff(int pumpNum)
             throws InvalidPumpException,
                    AlreadyAtStateException,
                    ComponentFailedException
        Turn off a Pump in the system
        Parameters:
        pumpNum - The id of the pump to turn off
        Throws:
        InvalidPumpException - Thrown when a bad pump ID is specified
        AlreadyAtStateException - Thrown if the specified pump is already on
        ComponentFailedException - Thrown if method is called when component is failed.

      • turnOn

        public void turnOn(int pumpNum)
            throws InvalidPumpException,
                   AlreadyAtStateException,
                   ComponentFailedException
        Turn on a Pump in the system
        Parameters:
        pumpNum - The id of the pump to turn on
        Throws:
        InvalidPumpException - Thrown when a bad pump ID is specified
        AlreadyAtStateException - Thrown if the specified pump is already on
        ComponentFailedException - Thrown if method is called when component is failed.

      • raise

        public int raise(int amount)
          throws InvalidRodsException,
                 MaximumRodsException,
                 ComponentFailedException
        Move the control rods up in the reactor by the amount specified
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to raise the control rods by
        Returns:
        The new height of the control rods
        Throws:
        InvalidRodsException - Thrown when amount specified is negative
        MaximumRodsException - Thrown when the rods attempt to exceed the maximum height
        ComponentFailedException - Thrown if method is called when component is failed.

      • lower

        public int lower(int amount)
          throws InvalidRodsException,
                 MinimumRodsException,
                 ComponentFailedException
        Move the control rods down in the reactor by the amount specified
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to lower the control rods by
        Returns:
        The new height of the control rods
        Throws:
        InvalidRodsException - Thrown when amount specified is negative
        MinimumRodsException - Thrown when the rods attempt to exceed the minimum height
        ComponentFailedException - Thrown if method is called when component is failed.

           throws InvalidValveException,
                  AlreadyAtStateException
        Close a SteamValve in the system
        Parameters:
        valveNum - The id of the valve to close
        Throws:
        InvalidValveException - Thrown when a bad valve ID is specified
        AlreadyAtStateException - Thrown if the specified valve is already closed

      • fix

        public void fix(Component component)
         throws InvalidComponentException,
                FixAlreadyUnderwayException,
                NoFixNeededException
        Begins a fix on any non-pump fixable component
        Parameters:
        component - The component to begin the fix upon
        Throws:
        InvalidComponentException - Thrown when a bad component is specified
        FixAlreadyUnderwayException - Thrown when a fix is already occurring in the system
        NoFixNeededException

      • fix

        public void fix(Component component,
       int pumpNum)
         throws InvalidPumpException,
                InvalidComponentException,
                FixAlreadyUnderwayException,
                NoFixNeededException
        Begins fixes for pumps
        Parameters:
        component - Must be set to WaterPump, used as a check to ensure desired functionality
        pumpNum - The id of the pump to be fixed
        Throws:
        InvalidComponentException - Thrown when a non-pump component is specified
        FixAlreadyUnderwayException - Thrown when a fix is already occurring in the system
        NoFixNeededException
        InvalidPumpException

        Parameters:
        fileName - specifies the name of the file

        Load reactor objects from a file
        Parameters:
        fileName - specifies the name of the file
        Returns:
        Hashtable containing the reactor objects
